Reliableweb T/A EAS IT Solutions LTD

We bring you our new line of OpenVZ Virtual servers. Hosted on Dual Quad Core Xeons with 8GB DDR3 RAM and RAID protected storage. We utilize Internap bandwidth for our virtual servers providing the lowest latency and best routes for information to travel.

Why choose us?

- UK Limited Company (Not a fly by night operation, were here for the long run)
- Hosted on Dual Quad Core Xeons with 1333MHZ FSB and 8MB Cache (8 Physical CPU Cores!)
- Internap Low Latency Bandwidth
- RAID Protected Storage
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
- Choice of Operating systems
- Semi-managed with no control panel included
- Managed if choosing cPanel or Directadmin
- Knowledgeable support staff
- Instant Setup

What support is offered: 24/7 support is offered and sales are answered in business hours. If no control panel is selected then your VPS will be semi-managed with basic assistance. Choose cPanel or Directadmin then your VPS will be fully managed.

Are we reselling another provider: No your VPS will be deployed on our own hardware

What Payment Methods do you accept: We accept PayPal and credit cards through 2Checkout or Google Checkout/Wallet

How long is setup: Instantly after receiving payment for your invoice

Any questions please email us at sales@reliableweb.co.uk or alternatively on MSN add sales@reliableweb.co.uk to speak directly in real time.

Thanks for reading and we look forward to working with you!!
